name: Counseling and Therapy Online: Current Practices
description: Counseling and Therapy Online: Current Practices is a multimedia collection that addresses the current best practices for counseling and therapy. It includes transcripts of real therapy sessions, video presentations by practicing therapists as well as presentations and publications by renowned academic therapists. The collection directly discusses the CACREP 8 Core Areas required by many states for counselor certification as well as a wide range of contemporary issues from working with LGBT clients to helping clients suffering from PTSD.

meta.more_info: This database is currently in a trial period. Please send feedback about this database to Jill Conte at jill.conte@nyu.edu
